name: Malignant Chain
description: You pour toxins into the target by wrapping them in a toxic, corrosive chain. Make a ranged attack, dealing 4d4 + MOVE poison damage on a hit. A creature that is hit must make a CON save against your Move DC or be badly poisoned.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
